info.name: Api.kivihealth.com
info.description:
This API collection will be used to perform fast CRUD operations for Doctor/Clinic/Patient bundles.
It helps in reducing the waiting time for response as it is based on Node JS non-blocking operations.

item.name: Doctor

request.description: This API is used to login into the account of a doctor, it will return an access_token which must be bind to every future requests.
This API returns details of a doctor like name,email,dob,gender,profilepic etc.
This API returns wheather subscription of a doctor has expired or not.
This API returns wheather an app version of the user is upto date or not.
This API returns list of cities associated with a particular doctor.
This API returns list of areas associated with a particular city.
This API registers/update FCM token for sending notification to the devices.

body.raw:
{
	"name":"Maulin Shah",
	"mobile":"8200239602",
	"gender":"1",
	"headline":"This is my Headline",
	"about":"This is my About",
	"dob":"2019-05-11",
	"skypeid":"skypeid",
	"patcontactno":"",
	"speciality":"Sales",
	"superspeciality":"Psychologist"
}

request.description: This API updates the basic details of a doctor like name,dob,skypeid,specicality,contact no. etc.
This API can be used to update the current password of the account of a doctor.
This API is used to generate change password request(forgot password). Upon success, user will receive a forgot password email on the their registered email id.
This API returns the list of all patients under a particular doctor along with their details like name,email,phone,address,medical history,profile photo,city etc.

This API returns list of all appointments booked for a doctor of a particular clinic.
It returns details like start time,end time, patient id etc.
This API returns all details of a patient like personal details, contact information , medical history , location information etc.
This API returns name,type of all groups of a patient in the table doctorgroups.
This API returns list of all files along with their details associated with a particular patient.
This API returns list of all Treatment Plans details associated with a patient.

item.description:
This sub collection contains all APIs related to a Doctor.
Route for these APIs will be api/doctorapi/

request.description: This API returns list of all consultants under a particular clinic.
This API returns list of all clinics under a particular doctor.
This API returns details of a clinic like name,email,contact, address, areas,ownersettings,clinicsettings etc.
This API returns list of all invoices of a patient associated with the doctor with details like invoice number,amount,discount,gst amount,notes,category,invoice dated etc.
This API is used to login into the account of a patient, it will return an access_token which must be bind to every future requests.
This API returns details of a particular clinic like name,email,contact,consultant list,timings,area,city etc.
This API returns all slots for a particular clinic for a particular date alongs with status of slot whether it is booked or not.
This API is used to book an appointment along with patient details, slot,which doctor and clinic to book appointment for.
This Api returns list of all prescriptions of a patient along with medicince and diagnosis details.
This API returns list of all the treatmentplans going for a patient.
This API returns list of all files of a patient like prescription, uploaded files etc.
This API is used for preauthorization of users using a link send to patient. On clicking this link patient can log in directly without credentials.
This API sets password for a patient account after preauthorization of the user. Emai, password and patientid is required for this API.
This API returns the list of all appointments booked by a patient along with apointments details.
This API is used to update profile details of a patient like first name,contactno,address etc.
This API returns list of cities associated with a particular clinic.
This API returns list of areas associated with a particular city.
This API returns list of all symptoms associated with a clinic.
This API is used to authenticate a patient using a preauth code, a referral code is attached in the request.
This API updates firebase ID and user device ID in the patient table.
This API is used to change password of a user account.
